title: Who made that thread about building Edge of Night on ADCs not too long ago?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/nX57YPs.png/img

######Not the greatest image quality, but yah see it, so it works

Cuz whoever yah are, ye just called it bein' a thing, give yerself a pat on da back.

Right now in the current LCS match of TSM vs. DIG match 2, TSM's WildTurtle built it on Varus.
